Headline: #115 Pullman/115th Temporary Reroute at Cottage Grove/95th-96th
ShortDescription: 115 Pullman/115th buses are rerouted via 95th, King Drive, 103rd, Cottage Grove, then resume normal route, due to a street blockage near Cottage Grove/95th-96th

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#115 Pullman/115th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 95th, King Drive, 103rd, Cottage Grove, then resume normal route, due to a street blockage near Cottage Grove/95th-96th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #4 Cottage Grove Temporary Reroute at Cottage Grove/95th-96th
ShortDescription: 4 Cottage Grove buses are temporarily rerouted via Cottage Grove, 95th, King Drive, 103rd and Cottage Grove due to a street blockage nr Cottage Grove/95th-96th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#4 Cottage Grove buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Cottage Grove, 95th, King Drive, 103rd, then resume normal route on Cottage Grove due to a street blockage near Cottage Grove/95th-96th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #52 Kedzie/California and #52A South Kedzie Southbound Reroute near Kedzie/47th
ShortDescription: SB 52 Kedzie/California and 52A South Kedzie buses are temporarily rerouted via Kedzie, 47th, California, 51st & Kedzie, due to street blockage near Kedzie/47th

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

Southbound #52 Kedzie/California and #52A South Kedzie buses are temporarily rerouted via Kedzie, 47th, California, 51st, then resume their normal route on Kedzie, due to street blockage near Kedzie/47th.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Headline: #47 47th Temporary Reroute near Kedzie/47th
ShortDescription: 47 47th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to street blockage near Kedzie/47th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#47 47th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to street blockage near Kedzie/47th.

  • Westbound buses will operate via 47th, California, 51st, Kedzie, Orange Line, then resume their normal route on 47th.
  • Eastbound buses will operate via 47th, Christiana, 48th, Kedzie, Orange Line, then resume their normal route on 47th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: No trains between Conservatory and Harlem/Lake
ShortDescription: Green Line service has been temporarily suspended between Conservatory and Harlem/Lake due to fire department activity at Laramie.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Green Line service has been temporarily suspended between Conservatory and Harlem/Lake due to fire department activity at Laramie.

As a result, trains are operating only between Ashland/63rd, and 63rd/Cottage Grove AND Conservatory at this time.

Shuttle buses are available between Harlem and Conservatory to provide connecting service in both directions.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Midway-bound Orange Line Service Delayed at Western
ShortDescription: Midway-bound Orange Line trains are standing at Western.  Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Midway-bound Orange Line trains are standing at Western. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
